titles.title: RS108 The Love of God is broard

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The love of God is broard like beach and meadow,
wide as the wind, and an eternal home.
God leaves us free to seek him to reject him,
he gives us room to answer YES or No.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We long for freedom where our truest being
is given hope and courage to enfold.
We seek in freedom space and scope fpr dreaming
and look for ground where trees and plants can grow.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
.But there are walls that keep us all devided
we fence each other in with hate and war.
Fear is the bricks and mortar of our prison,
our pride of self the prison coat we wear.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O judge us , Lord, and in your judgement free us ,
and set our feet in freedom's open space;
take us as far as your compassion wanders
among the children of the human race..
